component.text:
Topology
Use this topology diagram as a reference for scenarios 1 to 3. Click Button 2 to continue.

Activity - Scenario 1: Troubleshoot EIGRP Routing Table Issues
R1 is unable to reach the 172.17.0.0 network. Use the topology diagram and the routing table to determine the most likely cause of this issue. Drag the most likely reason for this EIGRP routing table issue to the field next to Router 1 (R1). Click Button 3 to continue.
You have successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP routing table issue for this scenario. Click Button 3 to continue.
You have not successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP routing table issue for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Scenario 2: Troubleshoot EIGRP Routing Table Issues

You have successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP routing table issue for this scenario. Click Button 4 to continue.
You have not successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP routing table issue for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Scenario 3: Troubleshoot EIGRP Routing Table Issues
